mapper.update: update tb_product set product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_category_id = #{productCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_addr = #{imgAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, normal_price = #{normalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, promotion_price = #{promotionPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_edit_time = #{lastEditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable_status = #{enableStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where product_Id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select product_Id, product_name, product_category_id, shop_id, product_desc, img_addr, normal_price, promotion_price, create_time, last_edit_time, priority, enable_status from tb_product where product_Id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select product_Id, product_name, product_category_id, shop_id, product_desc, img_addr, normal_price, promotion_price, create_time, last_edit_time, priority, enable_status from tb_product
